meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>rotation</kanji> of <kanji>wind</kanji> forms a <vocabulary>whirlwind</vocabulary>, in both the physical and figurative senses. On the figurative side, it can also mean <vocabulary>commotion</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>sensation</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out because ふう becomes ぷう here (hehe).
